description.originalText: Ricky is THE BEST! He took care of my elderly father after a stroke left him unable to walk. Ricky is kind, compassionate, strong, responsible, and my dad really enjoyed spending time with him. Ricky is professional and knows how to care for the elderly including taking care of personal hygiene, diet, administering medication, taking to doctor appointments and errands as necessary. He was also a wonderful companion for my dad. We always felt comfortable and reassured knowing Ricky was caring for my dad as he always went above and beyond to help my dad.  Anyone under Rickyâ€™s care is lucky and in very good hands.

description.displayText: When we interviewed Rick, we were impressed with his demeanor, knowledge, and references, and we encouraged our elderly uncle to engage him as a caregiver/companion. We felt blessed to have him and were hoping it would be a long, beneficial relationship. Unfortunately, Ricky was only able to care for our uncle for two weeks because our uncle had a sudden decline and passed away two weeks after Rick started. However, for those two weeks, Ricky anticipated our uncle's needs and kept him comfortable. He was attentive, knowledgeable about his care needs, proactive, positive, upbeat, soothing, kind, patient and empathetic. We highly recommend him.

description.displayText: Rick has been a fantastic caregiver for my father over the last several months. My father has advanced Parkinsons & dementia requiring an excessive amount of support and effort. Rick exceeded all expectations while taking care of my father. He always had new ideas and ways to help care for my father as his condition continued to decline. He truly became a member of the family during his time with us and we think he gave my father amazing care. He was always on time, always reliable and if I would recommend Rick to anyone in need of a compassionate and caring individual.

description.displayText: Scheduled him for an interview as a potential caregiver. He did not show up to the interview or call.
description.originalText: Scheduled him for an interview as a potential caregiver. He did not show up to the interview or call.

description.displayText: Ricardo (Rikki) showed compassion and empathy for my dad and our family.  He always demonstrated patience and was soft spoken regardless of the situation.  He was a caregiver for my father during his in home hospice stay for 2 years. Although his primary responsibility was taking care of my dad, he also provided companionship to my mother and looked out for her well being.  He provided updates to the entire family by texting, calling and emailing. Even though the Covid year was extremely difficult, he continued to work hard at maintaining my parents' safety with humor and kindness.  My mother passed unexpectedly from a heart attack and Rikki was there to call 911, stay and hold her hand and ensured that the family was consulted at every step.  Rikki became a member of our family, while maintaining his professionalism, kindness and compassion.  We would recommend him highly.

description.displayText: Ricky took care of my father Full Time for 3 years who had dementia and Alzheimer's. Ricky was the 5th Home Health Aide my father was very particular due to his condition but when he met Ricky he liked him right away , Ricky  has a strong silent personality and due to his experience knows how to handle this difficult situation with care. Ricky became a trusted part of out Family and took all off the stress off of us and kept my dad clean healthy and happy not an easy task. My dad was a former Marine and retired NYPD Police Officer of 43 years. I can't tell you how much Ricky helped us out with our Dad who lost  his fight at almost 90 years old. I would highly recommend Ricky to anyone ,looking for a professional , strong. ,reliable and trusted Home Health Aide. Never late and never missed a day a rare quality  these days.

description.displayText: Ricky was my favorite member of the team who helped care for my husband during the last weeks of his life.  Ricky was always kind and is among the most compassionate of people I've known!  He's extremely competent and always pleasant.  My husband looked forward to Ricky's arrival in the evening and I got some much needed sleep at night knowing everything was under control!
